title: $L^p$-$L^q$ estimate of the Fourier multipliers on noncommutative spaces
abstract:
In this work, we study Fourier multipliers on noncommutative spaces. In
particluar, we show a simple proof of $L^p$-$L^q$ estimate of Fourier
multipliers on general noncommutative spaces associated with semi-finite von
Neumann algebras. This includes the case of Fourier multipliers on general
locally compact unimodular groups.
